title: The Box with the Gilded Mask (La Loge au mascaron doré), program for The Missionary (Le Missionnaire) from The Beraldi Album of Theatre Programs
medium: One from an album of 50 lithographs
dimensions: composition and sheet: 12 1/16 x 9 7/16" (30.6 x 24 cm)
credits: Johanna and Leslie J. Garfield Fund, Mary Ellen Oldenburg Fund, and Sharon P. Rockefeller Fund
